Korean food @borit_gogae_kfood 🇰🇷 Healthy and tasty, just like home.

KBBQ 🇰🇷 at Soowon Galbi (@soowon_galbi)
This tops our KBBQ list along with Yangmani. Yangmani would be better for intestines and some other beef cuts; this is a galbi (rib) specialty shop.

Although many get the marinated rib here QQ prefers the “seng galbi” because she doesn’t like the sweet taste of the marinade. The beef was good, banchan were good, and although the restaurant was crowded service was still on point.
Pakistani dinner at Kaan Saab (@khansaab_oc) in OC. Our favorite was the lamb chops!

Ethiopian 🇪🇹 at Meals by Genet (@mealsbygenet)

Our favorite Ethiopian place in LA so far. Everything was well seasoned and had a clean, distinct flavor. Upper left side is the lamb and rest is veggie combo.

Back at Le Champ (@lechamp_la 🇫🇷)! We always like to start with the endive salad and the coquilles St Jacques. And my favorite is the burger, which has a light wasabi flavor and a fat juicy patty, it’s soo good!

First time dining at Barrique (@barriquevenice 🇮🇹) We had the grilled octopus, lobster linguine, duck breast, and tronchetto. Everything was really good, especially the octopus! QQ wished the onions were less heavy on the honey but Bongo liked it. I think this might become our go-to Italian spot in the neighborhood, along with Cento!

We were in a cozy, romantic patio, service was attentive. Table on the smaller side.

Japan 🇯🇵 
Izakaya Ichie (@ichieizakaya) in The Source OC (@thesourceoc)

Everything in the omakse bowl was super fresh. We also had the tako wasa and mentaiko cream udon which were really good. The table next to us got the yakitori which also looked delicious. Nice casual place that’s great to hang out with friends. Definitely will return! 🙂
Yum woon sen, my favorite dish @ La La Rice (Thai 🇹🇭) Just the right amount of acidity and chili!

Toranj (@toranj_restaurant_la) 🇮🇷

The juicy chicken is juicy. Maybe the picture doesn’t do justice. One of the nicer Persian restaurants- definitely will be back!

Last dinner of the year @lechamp_la 🇫🇷
Happy new year, everyone!

Our favorites were trout and crab. Soo good! Every fish should be served with guava jam.

Korea 🇰🇷 @obsquare_tustin 

1. egg roll
2. old style whole fried chicken
3. army stew
